titleStmt.title: T. M Jones et al. to Beriah Magoffin
CWG9453

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons and Remissions, 1859-1862

body.p: To his excellency B MaGoffin Govr of Ky.

The Undersigned Your petitioners respectfully ask; and Solicit You; that you will remit all that portiion of a Judgment rendered against James Todd at the Term of the Calloway Equity & Crimminal Court that Sentences him to fifteen days imprisonment in the County Jail of said County. The Judgement is bassed On an Indebtment for a Breach of the Peace, Which however was of small magnitude.

T, M, Jones
C. A. Duncan
S. B. Stone witness
P H Beckham atty at Law
J S. Gardner
Newton Dancel
E. H. Ryan
J, G, Anderson
C. S. Stubblefield
S C Skaggs
Z.. Blythe
Jas R. Smith
S. M Ewards
